data.title: HARRY C. HUGHES
data.meta_description: HARRY C. HUGHES DOVER-FOXCROFT – Harry C. Hughes, 71, husband of Sandra S. Hughes went to be with the Lord April 23, 2004, at a Bangor hospital. He was
data.text: HARRY C. HUGHES DOVER-FOXCROFT – Harry C. Hughes, 71, husband of Sandra S. Hughes went to be with the Lord April 23, 2004, at a Bangor hospital. He was born Sept. 16, 1932, to David and Louise Hughes. He was retired for 34 years from Nynex and a member of the Dover Church of the Nazarene. He was an avid fisherman and hunter who loved the outdoors. He is survived by his loving wife, Sandra; his beloved children, Eileen and her husband, Jim, Scott and his wife, Karen, and Brenda and her fianc?, Brian; three special grandchildren, Adam, Leah and Logan; one sister, Ina and her husband, Richard; two nieces; and several cousins. Visitation will be from 2-4 p.m. Sunday at the Lary Funeral Home in Dover where funeral services will be conducted 2 p.m. Monday by the Rev. David McLeish. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to the Monson Community Church.
